entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the Care of Magical Creatures teacher who is talking to Harry about the creatures outside the bedroom door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is being spoken to by Hagrid and is also the one who sees the creatures with cannons for heads.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George's voice is heard calling Harry from under his bedclothes.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum is mentioned as the one who needs Harry in the drawing room and has found a nest of dead puffskeins under the sofa.
